 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּג‎</span>] **verb** ==grow numb== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grow cool***; **\*\***Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***become cold*** ([[Matt.24.12|Matt 24:12]]), ***fail, become weak, inefficient***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּג‎</span> ***become cold, fail, be*** or (Pa\`el) ***make ineffectual***; Late Hebrew ***id., fail, vanish***. Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be cold***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּג‎</span> ***cease, be helpless***; Late Hebrew ***id. vanish***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּפָג לִבּוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.45.26|Gen 45:26]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּפוּג‎</span> [[Ps.77.3|Ps 77:3]] of hand (si vera lectio, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נגר‎</span>), i.e. drop helpless; [[Hab.1.4|Hab 1:4]] of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺרָה‎</span>, i.e. be ineffective. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְפוּגֹתִי וְנִדְכֵּיתִי‎</span> [[Ps.38.9|Ps 38:9]] ***I am benumbed and crushed*** (figurative); read probably also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפּוֺגָה‎</span> [[Ps.88.16|Ps 88:16]] (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἅπ</span>. <span class="bdbLangGreek">λεγ</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפוּנָה‎</span>), [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Hup|Hup]] [[BDB#Dy|Dy]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָפוּגָה‎</span>.
